revised_title: Ceratopora: A New Family of Alcyonaria
tldr: The author discovers a new family of Alcyonaria, Ceratopora, through the examination of a unique coral specimen. The unique features of this coral, such as its mushroom-shaped structure, brown tubes, and long needle-like spicules, set it apart from other known corals and provide valuable insights into the classification of extinct coral forms.
